pr_title: Support for SE mappers in MP.

timeline.message:
Support for SE mappers in MP.

Signed-off-by: Tomas Langer <tomas.langer@oracle.com>

Removed mandatory use of object mapping from security providers.
Use direct APIs to retrieve booleans.
Fixes to object mapping support in MP.

Signed-off-by: Tomas Langer <tomas.langer@oracle.com>

timeline.bodyText: Just checking (not familiar with the complexities of Helidon Config): is this truly supposed to be a string, "0"?
timeline.author: ljnelson

replies.bodyText:
Yes - if there is an array in configuration, it uses index. I am just checking that there is a subkey with the first index.
list.0=first
list.1=second
objectlist.0.name=first
objectlist.0.value=first value
objectlist.1.name=second
objectlist.1.value=second value
